description:
Aquaria is a side-scrolling action-adventure game. It follows Naija, an
aquatic humanoid woman, as she explores the underwater world of Aquaria.
Along her journey, she learns about the history of the world she inhabits
as well as her own past. The gameplay focuses on a combination of swimming,
singing, and combat, through which Naija can interact with the world. Her
songs can move items, affect plants and animals, and change her physical
appearance into other forms that have different abilities, like firing
projectiles at hostile creatures, or passing through barriers inaccessible
to her in her natural form.
From: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aquaria_(video_game)

v1.5.1TongueFix.description:
# Aquaria randomizer v1.5.1

## Hotfix

This feature fix a bug where the "Remove body Tongue" option  in the v1.5.1 version of the game did not work properly.

## Installation procedures

- Linux appimage installation: [install_appimage.md](../master/docs/install_appimage.md)
- Windows installation: [install_windows.md](../master/docs/install_windows.md)
- Linux tarball installation: [install_linux.md](../master/docs/install_linux.md)

## What's Changed

- New option to disable the healing when saving.
- Fix "Remove body Tongue" option.
- New check:
    * Location: Sit on the sealed throne
    * Item: Door to the Cathedral
v1.5.1TongueFix.title: Aquaria randomizer v1.5.1 Remove body tongue option fix

v1.5.2-Releaser4.description:
## Installation procedures

- Linux appimage installation: [install_appimage.md](../master/docs/install_appimage.md)
- Windows installation: [install_windows.md](../master/docs/install_windows.md)
- Linux tarball installation: [install_linux.md](../master/docs/install_linux.md)

## What's Changed

- Changing how Item pool is filled
    * The simple ingredients (Fish bones, Fish Meat, Fish Oil, etc.) has been removed from the default item list
    * The defaut item list is added to the item pool and after that, filler items (simple ingredients, traps, etc.) are added to the pool.
- New way to show server message
    * Show messages in the bottom left of the screen
    * Show Message on top of every thing (or almost)
    * Show colors in messages to highlight item, location, player, etc. 
- Adding traps in the item pool (optional)
    * Poison trap: Naija became poison for 10 seconds
    * Blind trap: Naija became blind for 10 to 30 seconds
    * Rainbow trap: Naija became drugged (like with Rainbow soup) for 10 to 30 seconds
    * Mute trap: Naija cannot sing anything for 10 to 30 seconds (she is stuck in Normal form and cannot sing)
- Adding progressives recipes (optionnal)
    * You get progressive items for recipe categories (Soup, Roll, Poultice, Perogy, etc.)
    * Each time you get a progressive recipe, you get a different recipe from the preceding one,
    * When you have obtain every recipes from a category, you will receive a random dish from that category.
- Adding the "body's tongue opened" item and the "beating the Golem" location (optional).
- Making it that as soon as the items "Li and Li's song" and "Dual Form" are received, you can always transform to Dual Form (even when Li is not in the teams).
    * This is necessary because, now that we have the "Body's tongue opened" item, it is possible that we cannot free Li after loosing it after the Golem fight. If that happen, some item still in logic could become unobtainable.
    * Note that this make it possible to go in the body bottom area (gauntlet) without freeing Li from it's cage. Li is still needed to battle the Creator though.
- Adding websocket compression
- Adding some Glitch options:
   * Some Sing bulbs can be checked by singing from far away (across wall or steam)
   * Fish form may be used to go around blocking rocks
   * In Sun Temple, the save crystal can be use to teleport from the left side to the right side of the temple
   * The Dark Jelly in Mithalas City can be used to cross the top path stream
   * Fish Form can be used to cross steam and get the Trident Head
   * Nature Form Jump can be used to climb Sun Temple boss path cliffs
   * Can use Rock jump and Bind Song to get to the Urchin Costume
v1.5.2-Releaser4.title: Aquaria randomizer v1.5.2
